comment: Equivalence relation on its natural domain implies that the class of coelements on the domain is equal to the relation (this is the most convenient form of ~ prter3 and ~ erim2 ). (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 7-Oct-2021.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 29-Dec-2021.)
